analysis.description:
KahnDistributionCentre.removeUserWhitelist (/unique_chucks/15/0x26788f0670bdf9594ba1a677a977e97eb68568db.sol#2) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- baddr != address(0) && bounties[baddr].user_address == baddr

KahnDistributionCentre.removeUserWhitelist (/unique_chucks/15/0x26788f0670bdf9594ba1a677a977e97eb68568db.sol#2) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- baddr != address(0) && bounties[baddr].user_address == baddr
KahnDistributionCentre.updateMultipleUsersReward (/unique_chucks/15/0x26788f0670bdf9594ba1a677a977e97eb68568db.sol#2) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- bounties[baddr].user_address == baddr

Reentrancy in KahnDistributionCentre.claimImmediateTokens (/unique_chucks/15/0x26788f0670bdf9594ba1a677a977e97eb68568db.sol#2):
	External calls:
